tracks.text: Morlock looks at the post box in the cavern. Gibungle stares, his eyes wet
Intro
Title card with double bladed swords. Text, Ninja and Witch
Gibungle's eyes grow wide. He falls back, a kunai knife sticking out of his beard.
Raelza lowers her visor
Saito unlatches her sword from her back. Lafa heals Gibungle.
Her eyes grow wide. Kisurugi appears from the shadows.
2 demons appear from the shadows
Kisurugi stands with the demons and Primasse. Morlock and Saito gasp.
Text, 上級魔族, spelled upper + level + demon + race
Characters dart. Text, The witch who has lived 400 years
The greater demons exchange glances. The 3 continue across the arid land.
Kisurugi passes a bumble bee hovering amidst several purple, 5 petal flowers.
He spies a house under a large tree. Patches of trees and greenery dot the yellow, rocky land
The sun hangs high in the sky. The greater demons stand in shade under a tree.
Kisurugi, wearing all black, with only his hands and eyes exposed, stands in front of the house
Inside, tattered cloth lies strewn next to a splintered table leg. The table lies in pieces at odd angles.
Cobwebs fill the corners. Motes of dust shimmer in the air.
Kisurugi looks down at a stairs, previously hidden by the cloth and table
He walks down the stairs
Sun shines through the window, covering a white-haired woman who lies on a cloth on the basement floor.
Her back moves up and down in a slow, rhythmic motion.
Her feet and arms are bony and discolored. Her ankles and wrists are covered in bandages. Kisurugi approaches and kneels behind her.
Memory
Primasse, a chubby fairy with black wings and a short, black bob. She has green eyes and wears a white dress down to her thighs.
Primasse stares at him, then back to Ravella
Flashback, Kisurugi kisses the witch Ravella
His eyes grow wide. Primasse looks down.
He looks from the fairy to the witch
He remembers her smiling at him
On his knees, he looks at the ground, balling his fists.
He looks up
Present, Kisurugi and Raelza cross swords
He steps on her shadow, then is engulfed in light
The 5 eyed demon punches the dwarf magician's twin shields
5 eyes pushes the dwarf back
A beam of pink fire shoots from the winged demon's face
Standing athwart the torrent of flame, MOrlock raises his staff. 7 lights shine like stars around the demons then strike with lightning. They freeze a cloud of smoke and electricity engulf them.
5 eyes emerge from the smoke and grabs Saito by the head
He kicks in mid air. Raelza looks back at him
5 eyes squeezes, and Saito's head explodes into ribbons of blood. His headless body falls to the ground.
and explodes into pink, sakura petals. Raelza's eyes grow wide. 5 eyes looks at his empty hand
Demons turn. Saito rests in Guivre's arms.
Kisurugi grips his sword
5 eyes charges. A flying kick lands on his head. Flanlil glows green and watches 5 eyes fly. Ninia stands near Saito, her staff glowing green. Lafa floats over her Ninia's shoulder
5 eyes steps back, nearing the cave wall. Flanlil lands, back to back with Raelza
The flying demon hovers and shoots a beam from its mouth at the 2 fighters
A glowing green dome forms in front of them, blocking the beam
Guivre looks from Saito to Monpui and hangs his head
Gibungle, Ninia, Lafa, Cainz, Monpui, Raichee, Morlock, Liliza, and Saito stand side by side
Primasse flies
Raelza and Flanlil block Kisurugi
Raichee shoots lightning at Primasse
Light pulses between their hands. Kisurugi runs.
Flashback,He cuts a man into quarters. He slices the demon kings head.
A pillar of light shoots from Lafa and Ninia, racing towards 5 eyes
Kisurugi darts in front of it
Smoke engulfs him
Smoke clears. His clothes breaks into cinders. His mask cracks.
Kisurugi pants
The adventurers stare down the assassin and demons
Kisurugi drops his swords and holds Primasse
Characters turn black. Text, the fairy with black wings
Text, "Black Crystal Fairies", fairies which are just as beatiful as moonlight fairies... It is thought that there are only a few in the kingdom.
A young, slim Primasse flies across arid land.
His face glows purple, his eyes close, and he falls. Primasse floats
Ravella holds out her hands, and Primasse kneels on her palms.
English style scones and tea sit on the table. Silver candlesticks sit on a desk. A silver hairbrush rests by a mirror.
Present. Kisurugi holds Primasse's wings.
2 kunai float in the air
The kunai fly. Blood flies. Primasse falls away from her wings.
Her eyes glow red. Tendrils of purple energy swirl around her
A pillar of stone rises from the ground. It's covered in bumps and crackles with red lightning.
The bumps open, revealing dozens of bloodshot eyes. They look around in all directions.
An eye looks at Flanlil. Red light. Flanlil's ear separates from her head.
Fade to white
